document.full_text: american bubba watson eagled the par-five 11th for a second consecutive day on his way to an early one-shot lead in the second round of the new orleans classic on friday.
document.title: eagle hunter watson takes early control in new orleans
lines_and_colors: american bubba watson eagled the par-five 11th for a second consecutive day on his way to an early one-shot lead in the second round of the new orleans classic on friday.
